description: After Chad Knight (non-sexual role) warns skiers Hal Rockland and Danny Somers of a potential avalanche, the two head inside to warm up. Somers sucks his uncut bud in a chair before sitting on Rockland's fingers, then takes a huge dick up his ass in a scene that pairs two star veteran performers.
series: The Other Side Of Aspen III: Snowbound
title: The Other Side Of Aspen III:  Snowbound
